subject: Apologies
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The defensive coordinator Carl Pelini said he was sorry for his actions after a 9-6 loss at Texas A&M over the weekend. A day earlier, his brother, Coach Bo Pelini, offered an apology for his sideline behavior during the game.
snippet: The defensive coordinator Carl Pelini said he was sorry for his actions after a 9-6 loss at Texas A&M over the weekend. A day earlier, his brother, Coach Bo Pelini, offered an apology for his sideline behavior during the game.
